citations.narrative:
Tiger "Frosty" enclosure: The den box is chewed on the edges of the front, opening and on corners and edges of
the den box with splintering present.
Tiger "Carmen" enclosure: The den box is chewed, splintered below the opening of box, on the top surface, and
along the edges and corners. A system of maintenance must be in place to ensure facilities are kept in good repair.
A similar non-compliant item was noted on the February 12, 2014 inspection report.
Original Correction date: 3-19-14
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
